content:
I'd be happy to walk you through the process of using your gift card to purchase the Frye Melissa Tote online at Nordstrom.com.

Here's a step-by-step guide to help you complete your purchase:

**Step 1: Go to Nordstrom.com**

Open a web browser and navigate to [www.nordstrom.com](http://www.nordstrom.com).

**Step 2: Search for the Frye Melissa Tote**

In the search bar at the top of the page, type "Frye Melissa Tote" and press Enter. This should take you to the product page for the tote.

**Step 3: Select the Tote and Add to Cart**

On the product page, make sure you're selecting the correct color (black) and size (one size). Click the "Add to Cart" button to add the tote to your shopping cart.

**Step 4: View Your Cart and Proceed to Checkout**

Click on the shopping cart icon at the top right corner of the page to view your cart. Review the items in your cart to ensure everything is correct. Click the "Checkout" button to proceed to the checkout process.

**Step 5: Sign In or Create an Account**

If you have a Nordstrom account, sign in with your email and password. If you don't have an account, you can create one or checkout as a guest.

**Step 6: Enter Gift Card Information**

On the checkout page, click on the "Gift Card" option as your payment method. Enter your gift card number and PIN (if required) in the designated fields. Click "Apply" to apply the gift card balance to your order.

**Step 7: Review and Submit Order**

Review your order summary to ensure everything is correct, including the tote, price, and gift card balance. If everything looks good, click the "Place Order" button to complete your purchase.

**Step 8: Receive Order Confirmation**

Once your order is processed, you'll receive an order confirmation email from Nordstrom with details about your purchase, including the order number, tote details, and expected shipping date.

That's it! Your Frye Melissa Tote will be on its way to you soon. If you have any issues during the checkout process, you can contact Nordstrom's customer service for assistance.

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further guidance.
